name: Detective Cat
description:
A very short game I made to flesht out some quick ideas... No pretention, just gentle intentions.

The kitchen has been vandalized !

Only Detective Cat is here anyway can solve this crime !

Find all the culprits on your list of surely-guilty-suspects !

Controls

Use the mouse to over elements and [Left Click] on them to interact.

Press [Enter] to restart, or [Escape] to quit.
